Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.items

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Collectable
    This interface defines the required properties for an object that can be collected.
    Entity
    An item which has the ability to move around.
    Item
    State the properties of an object which could occupy a tile.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Block
    Create door objects which entity can pass across if they have collected the right key.
    ExitLock
    The block that prevents the exit to be reached unless all chips have been collected.
    Harmful
    An item that when players interacts with these items they will be affected in a negative way.
    Key
    Represent keys which can be take up a whole tile in the board of be collected by an entity.
    Player
    Represent the token of chip (the player).
    Remedy
    Create an item which can be used as a remedy again Harmful items.
    Treasure
    Treasures are the chips which have to be collected to finish the game.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Harmful.DangerType
    Types of harmful items.
    Key.Colour
    Group and define the finite type of keys that are available.
    Remedy.Type
    Specify what will this remedy is for.
